extendedIngredients.name: almond milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 bars Milk Chocolate Almond Bark, melted (a 14 ounce package has bars in 2 ounces each so you would need 3 bars or 6 ounces of chocolate)

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Sweet Snacks;Frozen;Baking
extendedIngredients.name: caramel
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ bag Caramel squares, melted or more as needed. I also use a hunk of Peter's Caramel Brick from Orson Gygi

recipes.title: Salted Caramel Pretzel Snaps
recipes.instructions: Lay out wax or parchment paper, using a spoon, drizzle a little chocolate on the paper and smooth it out a little with the back of the spoon like you are painting a circle. Drop three pretzels, slightly overlapping onto the chocolate and spoon a little melted caramel over all three. Sprinkle with a little sea salt and then drizzle a little more chocolate. Let set and store in Tupperware.

steps.step: Lay out wax or parchment paper, using a spoon, drizzle a little chocolate on the paper and smooth it out a little with the back of the spoon like you are painting a circle. Drop three pretzels, slightly overlapping onto the chocolate and spoon a little melted caramel over all three. Sprinkle with a little sea salt and then drizzle a little more chocolate.
Let set and store in Tupperware.
